title: Brookfield Near Deal to Sell London’s CityPoint Office Tower
description: Brookfield Corp. is in exclusive negotiations to sell London’s CityPoint office tower for roughly the value of the outstanding debt secured against it.
content: Brookfield Corp. is in exclusive negotiations to sell London’s CityPoint office tower for roughly the value of the outstanding debt secured against it.
